Timestamp: 1492 DR, Mirtul 15, 09:00:00
Location: The Athenaeum of Whispered Tomes
Status: Lvl 1 Fighter | HP: 12/12 | XP: 0/300 | Gold: 10gp","narrative":"Morning light filters through stained glass windows, casting prismatic patterns across rows of towering bookshelves. The Athenaeum of Whispered Tomes awakens around youâ€”leather creaks, pages rustle, and the dust-motes dance in the golden beams. Somewhere in these endless stacks lies knowledge that the world has forgotten. You can feel it calling to you.

The head librarian, an elderly woman with silver spectacles perched on her nose, glances up from her desk. "First arrival again, I see," she murmurs. "The archives don't open until the tenth bell. But if you're seeking something... particular..." Her eyes gleam with knowing curiosity.","planning_block":{"thinking":"The library seems to have regular hours, but there's an opportunity here. The librarian clearly knows more than she lets on. I should either wait for the archives to open or try to extract information about rare texts from her.","choices":{"explore_stacks":{"text":"Explore the Stacks","description":"Wander through the endless bookshelves yourself, looking for anything unusual","risk_level":"low"},"question_librarian":{"text":"Question the Librarian","description":"Press the elderly woman for information about rare or forbidden texts","risk_level":"medium"},"wait_archives":{"text":"Wait for Archives","description":"Patiently wait until the tenth bell when the restricted archives open","risk_level":"safe"},"investigate_sound":{"text":"Investigate Strange Sound","description":"A faint scraping echo draws your attention deeper into the stacks","risk_level":"medium"}}},"state_updates":{},"entities_mentioned":["The Athenaeum of Whispered Tomes","Elderly Librarian"]}</final>
